meanings.definition: A flat surface in a kitchen or workshop on which food can be prepared or work can be done.
meanings.sent1: The worktops in the kitchen are perfect for chopping vegetables.
meanings.sent2: She wiped the worktops clean before starting to cook dinner.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loves to jump onto the worktops and watch us cook.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cluttered worktops of ideas, waiting to be organized.
meanings.sent5: The shiny worktops gleamed under the bright kitchen lights.

meanings.definition: The top surface of a counter or table used for working or preparing food.
meanings.sent1: The bakery's worktops were always covered in flour and dough.
meanings.sent2: He placed the ingredients on the worktops before starting to bake.
meanings.sent3: The worktops in the cafe were so clean, you could see your reflection in them.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the solid worktops supporting her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The worktops in the restaurant were so smooth, the chef's knife glided effortlessly.
